questions.text: The largest city of Sindh by population is:
questions.explanation: Karachi is the largest city in Sindh and the most populous city in Pakistan.

questions.text: Keenjhar Lake is located in which district of Sindh?
questions.explanation: Keenjhar Lake, the second largest freshwater lake in Pakistan, is located in Thatta district.

questions.text: Which mountain range separates Sindh from Balochistan?
questions.explanation: The Kirthar Range forms the boundary between Sindh and Balochistan provinces.

questions.text: The Indus Delta is located in:
questions.explanation: The Indus Delta is located in southern Sindh where the Indus River meets the Arabian Sea.

questions.text: Mohenjo-Daro is located in which district?
questions.explanation: Mohenjo-Daro, the ancient Indus Valley Civilization site, is located in Larkana district.

questions.text: The total area of Sindh province is approximately:
questions.explanation: Sindh province has a total area of approximately 140,914 square kilometers.

questions.text: Which barrage on the Indus River is the largest in Pakistan?
questions.explanation: Sukkur Barrage, completed in 1932, is one of the largest barrages on the Indus River.
Manchar Lake in Sindh is the largest freshwater lake in Pakistan.

questions.text: The climate of Sindh is predominantly:
questions.explanation: Sindh has predominantly arid and semi-arid climate with hot summers and mild winters.

questions.text: Gorakh Hill Station is located in which mountain range?
questions.explanation: Gorakh Hill Station is located in the Kirthar Range in Dadu district of Sindh.
